name: Tired Tower
description:
You find yourself locked away in a strange, seemingly never-ending tower. Rumors say that the only way out is at the very peak... Time to find out.

Tired Tower is a turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler made in RPG maker, explore the titular tower in search of items that can help you survive, runes to blast away at the horrid beasts hiding within and equipment that defines you as an explorer.
